## Steps to do

1. Go to http://github.com, create a new repository (call it  like - ‘Reproducible_research_ENSGSI_2021’ or something similar), making sure it is public and you check the box that says ‘initialise new repository with a README’ — click ‘create repository’ at the bottom


2. The new repository (‘repo’) will be created and this is where you will be able to store all you code online. You will notice that a `README.md` markdown file has also been created. 
This can be edited to tell people what they are likely to find in this repository.
